<h3 id="X31737">X(31737) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: 1st ANTI-CIRCUMPERP AND 1st CIRCUMPERP</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*((b^2+c^2)*a^3+(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^2-(b^4+c^4)*a-(b^3+c^3)*(b^2+b*c+c^2))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31737) = X(1)-3*X(2979) = 5*X(10)-4*X(23841) = 3*X(51)-4*X(3634) = 2*X(143)-3*X(11231) = 3*X(165)-X(5889) = 9*X(373)-10*X(31253) = 2*X(389)-3*X(10164) = 2*X(1125)-3*X(3917) = 5*X(1698)-3*X(3060) = 3*X(1699)-5*X(11444) = 5*X(3567)-7*X(31423) = 7*X(3624)-9*X(7998) = 3*X(3817)-4*X(11793) = 6*X(3819)-5*X(19862) = 3*X(4134)-2*X(29958) = X(4301)-4*X(15606) = 4*X(5044)-3*X(15049) = 2*X(5446)-3*X(10175) = 4*X(5447)-3*X(10165) = 9*X(5650)-8*X(19878)</b>
<p>
For these triangles the orthopoles are concident.</p>
<p>X(31737) lies on these lines:
{1,2979}, {2,31757}, {3,31732}, {4,31752}, {10,511}, {40,11412}, {51,3634}, {52,6684}, {58,7186}, {72,2392}, {101,29092}, {110,9591}, {143,11231}, {165,5889}, {185,12512}, {373,31253}, {389,10164}, {515,10625}, {516,5562}, {517,6101}, {518,23156}, {595,3792}, {674,3874}, {942,9047}, {946,1216}, {1125,3917}, {1154,3579}, {1385,10627}, {1469,30145}, {1698,3060}, {1699,11444}, {2807,5493}, {2842,3962}, {2948,13201}, {3313,5847}, {3555,23157}, {3567,31423}, {3624,7998}, {3626,16980}, {3817,11793}, {3819,19862}, {3828,21969}, {3841,18180}, {3888,5508}, {4134,29958}, {4297,15644}, {4301,15606}, {5044,15049}, {5446,10175}, {5447,10165}, {5650,19878}, {5752,25440}, {5876,28146}, {5891,18483}, {6102,31663}, {6243,26446}, {7485,16472}, {7999,8227}, {9573,11445}, {9576,11446}, {9904,12273}, {9955,15067}, {9956,10263}, {10574,16192}, {11002,19877}, {11381,28158}, {11451,19872}, {11591,22793}, {12162,28150}, {12699,23039}, {13340,18481}, {13391,18480}, {13754,31730}, {14964,20727}, {20872,22136}, {25308,30172}</p>
<p>
X(31737) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {40, 11412}, {2948, 13201}, {9904, 12273}<br>
X(31737) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4, 31752), (52, 6684), (185, 12512), (946, 1216), (1385, 10627), (3555, 23157), (3874, 11573), (4297, 15644), (6102, 31663), (6243, 31760), (10263, 9956), (12699, 31751), (16980, 3626), (21969, 3828), (22793, 11591), (31728, 3579), (31732, 3), (31738, 6101)<br>
X(31737) = anticomplement of X(31757)<br>
X(31737) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (6243, 26446, 31760), (12699, 23039, 31751)<br>
</p>
